channel.title: A Little rap
channel.description:
I came up with this after I got dumped.. Rate it please.
i say life is bullshit and love is just crazy, we try to work at ut but we tend to get lazy, we try to fight our way back just to be put down, till the relationship turns it around, you see her rip your heart out while it still beating, then you feel the darkness creeping, your all alone while it's so dark, so you decide to walk to the park, to put some light into life, then you think of the harsh things like " heh she coulda been my wife," now you see you were better off in the start, but at the end she'll rip out your heart.

item.title: A Little rap
item.dc:creator: @killerman93 killerman93
item.description:
@killerman93 wrote:

Sound’s a bit more like soul then rap, still good nonetheless

Read full topic

item.title: A Little rap
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Your all alone… and it’s so dark…
Ya get up and head down to the… park.

sounds better imo. Since his whole poem seems to rhyme, I just followed the flow.

Read full topic

item.title: A Little rap
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“Ksu, post:1, topic:162727”]your all alone while it’s so dark,
so you decide to walk to the park,[/quote]

When you just add a random line in to make it rhyme, it actually ruins the lyrics as a whole, especially if you want them to be meaningful.

Read full topic

item.title: A Little rap
item.dc:creator: @omfku omfku
item.description:
@omfku wrote:

I love how people think raps need to rhyme.

Read full topic

item.title: A Little rap
item.dc:creator: @Ksu Ksu
item.description:
@Ksu wrote:

exe626:

The ending should be: “But in the end she ripped out your heart”. Nice though, its got potential.

Thanks.

Bobby:

Nice poem. 8/10 some of the lines seems forced in so you could ryhme

Thanks, I’ll remember that.

Read full topic

item.title: A Little rap
item.dc:creator: @Ksu Ksu
item.description:
@Ksu wrote:

I came up with this after I got dumped… Rate it please.

i say life is bullshit and love is just crazy,
we try to work at ut but we tend to get lazy,
we try to fight our way back just to be put down,
till the relationship turns it around,
you see her rip your heart out while it still beating,
then you feel the darkness creeping,
your all alone while it’s so dark,
so you decide to walk to the park,
to put some light into life,
then you think of the harsh things like " heh she coulda been my wife,"
now you see you were better off in the start,
but at the end she’ll rip out your heart.

Read full topic
